OpenAiConfigSetting.ApiKey: your api key from openai, required
OpenAiConfigSetting.OrganizationId: your org id from openai, required

DiscordConfigSettings.ClientId: your clientid, you only need this for discord connect
DiscordConfigSettings.ClientSecret: you only need this for discord connect
DiscordConfigSettings.BotToken: this is required for the bot
DiscordConfigSettings.TestGuildId: used to setup a test discord
DiscordConfigSettings.GuildId: can be used in your main discord
DiscordConfigSettings.RecordingsChannel: a sample channel to link and post to
